Data Exchange For Quality Measures STU1 for FHIR STU3 - Local Development build (v1.0.0). See the Directory of published versions

  • Narrative Content
  • XML
  • JSON

JSON Format: Task-Task01

Download Raw json 

{
  "resourceType" : "Task",
  "id" : "Task01",
  "meta" : {
    "profile" : [
      "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/StructureDefinition/qicore-task"
    ]
  },
  "text" : {
    "status" : "generated",
    "div" : "<div xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"><p><b>Generated Narrative with Details</b></p><p><b>id</b>: Task01</p><p><b>meta</b>: </p><p><b>identifier</b>: 19009</p><p><b>status</b>: completed</p><p><b>intent</b>: plan</p><p><b>priority</b>: routine</p><p><b>code</b>: Medication Reconciliation <span style=\"background: LightGoldenRodYellow\">(Details : {http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt code '1111F' = '1111F', given as 'Medication Reconciliation'})</span></p><p><b>for</b>: <a href=\"Patient-patient01.html\">Generated Summary: id: patient01; Medical record number = 12345 (USUAL); active; Jairo Webster (OFFICIAL); gender: male; birthDate: 1946-12-16; <span title=\"Codes: {http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/MaritalStatus M}\">Married</span></a></p><p><b>context</b>: <a href=\"Encounter-Encounter01.html\">Generated Summary: id: Encounter01; status: finished; <span title=\"{http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActCode IMP}\">inpatient encounter</span>; <span title=\"Codes: {http://snomed.info/sct 56876005}\">Drug rehabilitation and detoxification</span>; period: May 29, 2018, 8:00:00 AM --&gt; May 29, 2018, 8:00:00 AM</a></p><p><b>executionPeriod</b>: Jun 11, 2017, 12:00:00 AM --&gt; Jun 11, 2017, 12:00:00 AM</p><p><b>authoredOn</b>: Sep 25, 2018, 7:24:23 AM</p><p><b>owner</b>: <a href=\"Practitioner-practitioner01.html\">Generated Summary: id: practitioner01; Provider number = 456789123 (OFFICIAL); active; Cody Hale ; gender: male</a></p></div>"
  },
  "identifier" : [
    {
      "system" : "http://www.acme.org/tasks",
      "value" : "19009"
    }
  ],
  "status" : "completed",
  "intent" : "plan",
  "priority" : "routine",
  "code" : {
    "coding" : [
      {
        "system" : "http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cpt",
        "code" : "1111F",
        "display" : "Medication Reconciliation"
      }
    ]
  },
  "for" : {
    "reference" : "Patient/patient01"
  },
  "context" : {
    "reference" : "Encounter/Encounter01"
  },
  "executionPeriod" : {
    "start" : "2017-06-11",
    "end" : "2017-06-11"
  },
  "authoredOn" : "2018-09-25T14:24:23.584Z",
  "owner" : {
    "reference" : "Practitioner/practitioner01"
  }
}
